# Overview
Samples a 5% of all points created from raster that  will be used in GEE to extract data

## Library
```{r include=FALSE}
library(sp)
library(sf)
library(rgdal) # geospatial data
library(raster)
library(rgeos) # GIS Geometry
library(foreign) # deals with dbf files
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(lubridate)
```


# Data

## Fires
```{r}
en = st_read("../data/RastertoPoint/EnRdnbrPoint.shp", "EnRdnbrPoint") 

tw = st_read("../data/RastertoPoint/TwRdnbrPoint.shp", "TwRdnbrPoint") 

ch = st_read("../data/RastertoPoint/ChRdnbrPoint.shp", "ChRdnbrPoint") 
```

head(en)
```

```

# Sampling

## En
```{r}
set.seed(101)
en_data = en %>% sample_frac(0.05)
en_data
```


```{r}
ggplot(en_data, aes(x=EN_rdnbr)) + geom_histogram() 
```


## TW
```{r}
set.seed(101)
tw_data = tw %>% sample_frac(0.05)
tw_data
```


```{r}
ggplot(tw_data, aes(x=TW_rdnbr)) + geom_histogram() 
```

## CH
```{r}
set.seed(101)
ch_data = ch %>% sample_frac(0.05)
ch_data
```


```{r}
ggplot(ch_data, aes(x=CH_rdnbr)) + geom_histogram() 
```



## Write  to Shapefile
```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
st_write(tw_data, "../outputs/SamplePointRdNBR/TwSamplePt.shp", driver="ESRI Shapefile") 
```

```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
st_write(en_data, "../outputs/SamplePointRdNBR/EnSamplePt.shp", driver="ESRI Shapefile") 
```

```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
st_write(ch_data, "../outputs/SamplePointRdNBR/ChSamplePt.shp", driver="ESRI Shapefile") 
```
